item.title: Adam Schiff Warns Trump's Tariffs Are Driving Up Housing, Groceries, Everyday Goods For Californians
item.description: Rep. Adam Schiff highlights that Californians have paid over $1,100 in Trump's tariffs this year, making goods more expensive. read more

item.title: Kevin O'Leary Says Surprise GDP Surge Shows US Economy Remains World's Strongest
item.description: Kevin O'Leary expressed cautious optimism about the U.S. economy, highlighting a surprising GDP growth of over 4%. read more

item.title: Scott Galloway Urges Young Job Seekers To Prioritize Networking: 'The Person They Pick Is Someone Who Has...'
item.description: Scott Galloway is urging young job seekers to prioritize real-world relationships, saying personal advocates determine who gets hired. read more

item.title: Kennedy Center Demands $1 Million From Musician For Canceled Performance Over Trump Name On Christmas Eve
item.description: Trump-Kennedy Center demands $1 million from Chuck Redd for canceling his Jazz Jam performance in protest of the renaming honoring Trump. read more

item.title: Sam Altman Says OpenAI Is Hiring A Head Of Preparedness As AI Risks Grow
item.description: OpenAI, led by Sam Altman, is hiring a Head of Preparedness to tackle AI-related mental health and cybersecurity risks. read more
